title: Bug 121687: Exception thrown when exporting data from a table within a grid cell
description: An exception is thrown when attempting to export data from a table nested within a grid cell.
OB: Upon attempting to export data in a table within a grid cell, an exception is thrown.
EB: When exporting data from two tables, the expected result is that the data are successfully exported. However, the actual result is an exception thrown in the 'ReportEngineService.getMetaData()' function.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Insert a grid.
2. Attempt to export data from two tables.
Expected result: Data are exported successfully.
Actual result: Exception occurs in 'ReportEngineService.getMetaData()'.
